articles.author: ILLIA NOVIKOV
articles.title: Ukraine and Russia trade fresh accusations of targeting a major nuclear power plant - The Associated Press
articles.description: Russia and Ukraine are trading fresh accusations over renewed threats to Europe’s largest nuclear plant that has been caught up in the war. Moscow alleges Ukraine was behind drone attacks on the facility that were witnessed by U.N. inspectors. Kyiv, meanwhile…
articles.content: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) Russia and Ukraine are trading fresh accusations over renewed threats to Europes largest nuclear plant that has been caught up in the war, with Moscow alleging Ukraine was behind d… [+3369 chars]
